entry.title: [BIP Proposal] Mempool Validation and Relay Policies via User-Defined Scripts
entry.summary: Chris Guida addresses Greg, expressing concern that his honest and unfiltered reactions to Greg's previous statements might not be suitable for the Bitcoin Development Mailing List (Bitcoindev ML) and suggests such discussions might be more appropriate for Twitter. Chris clarifies he is genuinely interested in understanding Greg's perspective but feels the current response doesn't aid this understanding. He offers to move the conversation to Twitter, acknowledging he was unaware of Greg's activity there. Chris also expresses willingness to delete or retract any Twitter posts that may have misrepresented Greg's position. This exchange highlights a preference for choosing the right platform for certain types of discussions, emphasizing the importance of clear communication and understanding in professional exchanges.
